exceptions.tactic: intros P f Hf HP y x H.
intros P' f Hf HP y x H.
intros P' f' Hf HP y x H.
intros P' f' Hf' HP y x H.
intros P' f' Hf' HP' y x H.
intros P' f' Hf' HP' y' x H.
intros P' f' Hf' HP' y' x' H.

exceptions.exn: Cannot turn inductive le into an evaluable reference.
The reference HP was not found in the current environment.
The reference Hle was not found in the current environment.
The reference Hk was not found in the current environment.
The reference HP was not found in the current environment.
The reference k was not found in the current environment.
The reference Hk was not found in the current environment.

In environment P : nat -> Prop f : nat -> nat Hf : forall n : nat, f n < f (S n) x, y : nat H : x <= y H0 : forall n : nat, (exists k : nat, n = f k) -> P n H1 : forall n : nat, P n -> exists k : nat, n = f k Unable to unify "f y" with "f x".

original: intros P f Hf HP y x H. unfold le in H. rewrite HP. intros Hle. destruct Hle as [k Hk]. rewrite Hk. apply HP. exists k. rewrite Hk. reflexivity.
